title: Telegraph Travel Awards 2015/16: win a £45,000 stay in Andalusia for 20 people
text: Villa del Mar is a private villa located in the grounds of the famed Marbella Club, Golf Resort & Spa. The 5,000 square metre property blends the qualities of Andalusian architecture with the latest in contemporary comfort and elegance. The villa is ideal for those who desire the service and amenities of the Marbella Club in the privacy of their own villa. The Marbella Club has extended a two night stay in the property including daily breakfast for six people and a dinner at the iconic Grill Restaurant worth over 60,000 Euros. How to enter Follow this link to tell us about your favourite travel companies and destinations - and to enter the draw for one of 27 prizes . You will need to leave your name, telephone number and a valid email address. See here for full terms and conditions . The prize Villa del Mar was once the home of a Marbella aristocrat and elements of the villa still reflect this, while a host of fresh, modern features are also evident; architectural features and original antiques have been lovingly restored, there are handmade silk carpets and panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows, and even a grand piano. The gardens, a focal point for all who enter the villa were originally inspired by Spanish culture and the beauty of the Mediterranean. Guests can enjoy a private walk or yoga lesson in the Zen Garden or evening cocktails surrounded by the grandeur of the Alhambra inspired veranda. All six bedrooms at Villa del Mar have outdoor terraces which offer spectacular views of the gardens and Mediterranean sea. The Infinity pool is for the private use of Villa del Mar guests as is the state of the art cinema room. Guests can also enjoy their own private Hammam Sauna, Jacuzzi and gym. From arrival to departure, the experience is tailored to guests’ personal preferences. The amenities, activities and services are bespoke and created exclusively for each stay. From a 24-hour butler, maid, and dining staff and personalised packing services to a private spa therapist, personal trainer and selections of customised playlists preloaded onto iPads. The kitchen and bar are fully stocked with specific food, delicacies and spirits according to guests’ personal wish list and preset menus are prepared with personalised floral arrangements displayed. For further information please visit: www.marbellaclub.com/accommodation/villadelmar-en.html For reservations please contact Julian Cabanillas - julianc@marbellaclub.com The prize provider Located on the Southern Spanish Costa del Sol, on the heart of the ‘Golden Mile’ the Marbella Club Hotel Golf Resort & Spa enjoys 325 days of sunshine. Open year round, the renowned Marbella Club Hotel was once the private residence of Prince Alfonso von Hohenlohe and features 37 luxury bedrooms, 78 suites, 14 Andalusian-Style villas and the majestic Villa del Mar. In addition to its stunning accommodations and grounds, the Marbella Club also offers guests a wide variety of amenities and activities including two outdoor heated swimming pools, seasonal water sports, fitness centre, Kids’ Club by Minimec, equestrian centre, Dave-Thomas designed 18-hole golf course within the hills of Benahavis and Thalasso Spa.
